Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Nagaritha Drive, south of the Regalia Convent.
Room.LongDescription: Nagaritha Drive continues east and west through most of the town. To the east, Nagaritha passes the various orchards and farmlands encompassed by the Oceancrest walls, to ensure adequate grain during times of war. On the north is the Regalia Convent, a large building dedicated to mono- theistic research. The entrance to the building is to the west off of Marina Way.
